advices.advice: Write a letter to your future baby
Have a footbath or go to a salon for a pedicure
Consistently pay attention to intimate hygiene
Observe bodily indicators; they tell you what exactly you need
In case of muscle cramp or spasm (uterine hypertonus) or watery discharge, seek immediate medical assistance
Lay out the plan for your babyâ€™s room. Get an idea of where you want to place the cot, the night light, which colors you will use, and so on
